alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Tippah and Benton Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 454 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Canaan, or 13 miles northwest of Ripley, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Localized heavy rainfall also possible. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Ashland, Brody, Spring Hill, Whitten Town, Hamilton and New Canaan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
